data.text: We have a visual on the targets! Requesting immediate assistance!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Confirmed! It's the three who jumped from the train!
data.speaker: Grenadier

data.text: Don't let any of them escape!
data.speaker: Grenadier

data.text: So you must be the queen, huh!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: How did you get in here!?
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: It's those three terrorists from the train!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: You bastards aren't going to get away this time!
data.speaker: Flametrooper

data.text: Give it up, assholes, or we'll blow you to hell!
data.speaker: Elite Security Officer

data.text: Huh. Looks like an old model.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Don't underestimate it. It's slow, but it hits hard.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Aim for its legs. Bring it down.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I think you've got its attention, Cloud!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I'll draw its fire. You two stay on the offensive.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Come and get me, asshole! I ain't scared!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Right! I'll distract it. You two keep doing your thing.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hah, look at that! It's tough being Mr. Popular.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I'm guessin' we aim for that!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Damn! Think we gotta take these down first.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Now we can concentrate on the big one!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Dammit! I thought I was done with this shit.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: What're you up to? Shit! The tracks!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Don't wanna get caught by that shit!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: It's pulling out all the stops now.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Destroy the pilot! That'll expose the generator!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Gotta try busting through that pilot then, huh?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I know! If we break through that pilot...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: This thing just keeps comin' back for more!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Now we can do some damage!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: This is an announcement from the Shinra Electric Power Company.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: The terrorist group "Avalanche" has issued another bomb threat.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: In response, we have raised the threat level and entered a state of heightened alert.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: All lines are currently experiencing delays.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: We anticipate that our arrival in Sector 4 will be later than scheduled.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: From the station, we take the backstreets.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Once we're inside the facility, it's the same deal as last time.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: And then blow it all to hell.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Let's do this one for Jessie and Wedge. They deserve it.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I didn't think word would spread this fast.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: There's barely anyone on this train. And none of them look happy to be here.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Might stand out as a group.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: So do you still support those terrorists?
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: Avalanche is a blight on Midgar.
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: Their bomb threat has thrown our offices into chaos, let alone the reactor itself. It's total insanity!
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: But we won't lose heart! No! Everyone at Shinra agrees.
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: What? You got a problem with that?
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: Do I have a problem with that? Oh, you can bet─
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You know you're better than that.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Inspection and containment sweep initiated, commencing at the rear of the train.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Please! You have to get out of here!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: But I work for Shinra. I'm the enemy.
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: I don't want anyone to die. Please!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Looks like you're right, SOLDIER boy.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: The station will be crawling with security. We gotta jump.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Need to slow the train down.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Sounds like a Biggs plan E.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Okay, y'all watch and learn. I'm gonna jump. Gonna do it. Gonna show you how it's done!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I felt sure we had them, didn't you?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Speaking of which, where is the third?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Looks like it's gonna be plan E.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Plan A was if everything went off without a hitch.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Didn't work out, but we knew going in we had to have alternatives.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: From closer in to further out─B, C, D, and so on.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: From the station, it would've been a straight shot to the reactor.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Backup plans 'case we had to get off early.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Anyway, we were riding the train between Sector 4 and the main pillar when we had to bail out.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: And we ended up on the adjacent line, which should take us to Reactor 5.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: That's right. So for now we follow the tracks.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: 'Cause you can bet your ass it's gonna be crawling with security─all on high alert.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Not too far, though. Need to switch to a different route before we hit the station.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Our friends in Sector 5 marked the route, so don't worry about getting lost.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: It's a straight shot to victory, people!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You have nothing to worry about, sir. Preparations for the grand finale are proceeding without incident.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: I have the utmost confidence that everything will play out as you intended...
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Yes, of course. I will not fail you, sir.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Analytics reports that the results fall within the admissible range.
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: However, the casualty rate significantly exceeds previous proje─
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: Remind me what your job is. Is it to question the wisdom of your superiors and bemoan your personal hardships?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Casualty rate? You think I care about the casualty rate?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: If your stock runs low, then go round up more from Sector 3 or wherever else.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Use your head and bring me solutions instead of problems for a change, yes?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: They are pawns in a greater game.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: It is so hard to find good help these days.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Which is why the president ought to count his blessings.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: What would he do without me?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: We've compiled our report on Avalanche's combat capabilities and are─
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: Report, report, report! What good do you think a damn report will do anyone!?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Have you already forgotten the war with Wutai?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: We must crush them─thoroughly and completely, without hesitation or mercy!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: An enemy spared is an enemy who will repay your "kindness" with blood.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Shinra cannot and will not settle for anything less. Will you!?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: If so...I can only assume that you and your men no longer wish to serve in your current positions. Is that correct?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: We'll prepare the prototype in Section E for immediate deployment.
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: Another day, another victory! How do I do it!?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Sir, Analytics reports that the feed went down...
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: after an anomaly was registered during the test.
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: Or an excuse for your failure to properly prepare the armor?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: N-no sir! All modules were confirmed fully operational!
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: It's far more likely─given the circumstances─that the sensors were overloaded.
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: All the sensors in Section E are...inoperable.
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: We know exactly where they were headed.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Should you fail to do so...
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: You will deal with our intruders. Personally.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: If the armor is intact, then you'd best determine the nature of this anomaly soon.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Don't worry. I treat my people more than fairly. So don't disappoint me.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Just so you know...it's not gonna get any easier.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: The train will be passing an ID checkpoint shortly.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: I know, I know. But that doesn't mean I don't have butterflies in my stomach.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hey, would you mind keeping an eye on things the next car over? I'm worried there might be trouble.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Barret's always on edge before missions, but you know he's a good guy underneath it all. The people on this train don't.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Maybe...but I won't be until I know for sure.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Lockdown protocol initiated. This train car will enter lockdown in three minutes.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: You have to get to the next car!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: You wanna survive this? Then move!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Glad to see you're okay. So─where's Barret?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Tifa! Could use some help here!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Make it quick! Should be some stairs over there!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I've had it up to here with you damn robo-bugs! I'm gonna rip off those spindly legs of yours one by one!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: C'mon, we gotta get to Barret!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Good thing our colleagues put up all that Stamp graffiti. Without it, we'd be lost for sure.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: There's an old rail yard not far from here. What we're looking for's somewhere inside.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Security is a lot tighter than I thought it would be.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: If they wanna stand between us and the rail yard, that's their choice.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: No getting through that gate! Let's take the stairs.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Keep looking for faithful little Stamp. He'll lead us to the passageway.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: The hell you think you're doing!? Get back here!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You ain't gonna find shit over there!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Get back here! We don't have time for this!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hey, I think we missed the stairs.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Lockdown protocol initiated. This train car will enter lockdown in two minutes.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Lockdown protocol initiated. This train car will enter lockdown in one minute.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Lockdown protocol initiated. This train car will enter lockdown in thirty seconds.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Lockdown protocol initiated. This train car will enter lockdown shortly.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Initiating inspection and detention protocol in corresponding car.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Lockdown complete. One unauthorized passenger detained.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Inspection will continue until all unauthorized passengers are detained.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Okay, these must be the stairs.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I ain't going down without a fight!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hey, get your ass over here.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Get over here! It's briefing time!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: This calls for a song! Duhn-duhn-duhn-duhn, duhn duhn, duhn-da-duhn!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: That's gotta be the last of them...right?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Aw, who cares? We can take 'em! Now let's confirm our position and get back on mission! That reactor's waiting!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Everybody on the same page? We're going with plan E!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: That means we gotta follow these tracks for a while.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: When the time comes, remember: we just gotta follow the nose.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We look for graffiti, then head in whichever direction its nose points.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: But pay attention to railway signals too. You see blue lights, you're going the right way.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I ain't no exterminator. Why I gotta kill all these nasty-ass bugs?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: What is this? A science experiment!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Be damned if I'm going through that. Gotta look somewhere else.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: There's good ol' Stamp. Check his nose.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Yeah, they really captured the essence of corporate propaganda.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Alright. Let's figure out where the hell we are.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Gotta love the irony of Shinra's smarmy lapdog leading the way to its master's destruction.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You really don't like Stamp, do you, Barret?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: It's not that I hate him.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I hate the fact Shinra took a loyal animal like that and co-opted it for their own self-serving agenda.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: The passage is beyond these shipping containers. Let's slip through 'em.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: So, you bump into any giant robots like that in Reactor 1?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Yeah, except the bastard looked like a scorpion!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Speaking of which...what would you say that last one looked like?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Why don't you go check on Tifa? Quit screwing around here.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Go see how Tifa's doing. She needs you more than I do.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: None of this has fazed you at all, has it?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Comes with being a SOLDIER. They train you to be ready for anything.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Keep an eye on Barret for me, would you?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: If we're on heightened alert, that means more security officers, so we'll be safe...right?
Boss wouldn't let me take the day off. How about you?
One little bomb threat and people lose their shit.
I don't know anything about Avalanche, I swear!
Please don't hurt me. I...I didn't hear anything.
I have nothing more to say to you and your friend.
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: The Sector 4 offices got the worst of it. Everyone's panicking over there.
data.speaker: Shinra Middle Manager

data.text: So...if the bomb went off right now, what do you think would happen to us?
Stop talking like that! Sorry, he's such a worrier.
Everyone in Avalanche is probably in jail already.
You're right. No need to worry.
To keep Midgar running takes vast amounts of mako, which no doubt harms the planet.
I understand where Avalanche is coming from, I do. But that doesn't mean I condone what they're doing.
Don't wanna lose track of them.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: We gotta help Barret right now.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: If we keep wandering around, we're gonna get lost.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: You think Barret can hold them off by himself?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: You got any sense of direction at all?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You wanna keep going this way, you best explain yourself.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I think the reactor's in the other direction.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Sure the nose was pointing this way?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Think we took a wrong turn...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Not so fast. Take a closer look at the mutt's nose.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Merc, Tifa's got something to say.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: How about we retrace our steps?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We're going to the rail yard, remember?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Just so you know, this way leads to the station, not the rail yard.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I told you this ain't the right way!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hey, Cloud. Where are you going?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Cloud, we really ought to turn around.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: No reason to go this way, so let's not.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Are you just playing this by ear?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You see Stamp? Or blue lights?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hey. You sure we on the right track?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You've had your fun, now let's go back!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Just swallow your pride and turn around already!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Follow the blue lights and we'll reach the reactor.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You gotta check the signals, son. The signals!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: After Barret jumped, I knew that I had to go right after, but...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: If I wasn't, they would've never made me a SOLDIER.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hey, thanks. For when we jumped from the train, I mean.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: No biggie. You're pretty light, you know.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: You always know what to say.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Biggs is way ahead of us.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Jessie was gonna back him up, so it wouldn't surprise me if he needs our help.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: So let's not keep him waiting.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Guys...I think it might be a nest!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: All kinds of creepy-crawlies make themselves at home in the plate, then get messed up even more by the mako.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Ya like it, huh? You know there's room for one more.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Those things really creep me out.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: A train's gonna get derailed by 'em one of these days.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Check it out. I guess Shinra's doing something about those monsters after all.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Doing a half-assed job looks like.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Man, how'd we get such a shit detail?
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Screw it. Let's just give it a quick once-over and call it a day.
data.speaker: Flametrooper

data.text: If we can't find our way out of these tunnels...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: If that's what you think, feel free to turn around.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Man, just admit that you are.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Starting to remind me of one of Marlene's picture books. The one that's full of nothing but mazes...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Think you're making progress and then you hit a wall.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: You're starting to sound like Barret.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We should be reaching that secret passage real soon. I knew plan E wouldn't fail us. Shoulda called it "plan excellent"!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: What're we doing? You drop something?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You following the damn tail or something? Get it together, son!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Umm... So Stamp's nose should be our guide.
data.speaker: Tifa
